document_data.name: Mellyth Echorn
document_data.mainbody: Elder star '''Mellyth Echorn''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Corellon Larethian]] and the highest ranking priest of the deity in [[Evermeet]] after [[Seiveril Miritar]].

Personality.Political views: Strongly conservative, Mellyth was nominated to replace Seiveril Miritar on the [[Council of Evermeet]] by [[Selsharra Durothil]].
